CustomField.description: Include User, Contact, Account fields that are allowed to be used by the personalize anything component here. Example: @User.field1__c, @contact.name, @Account.customField1__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Include User, Contact, Account fields that are allowed to be used by the personalize anything component here. Example: @User.field1__c, @contact.name, @Account.customField1__c
CustomField.label: Allowed Fields
